hasIdtAdminAccess

public boolean hasIdtAdminAccess(java.lang.String value)
                          throws DatabaseException
Checks the existence of the IDT administration flag in the tran_ctr table.

The value of the column, trantype, should be equal to the String value, Display_IDT, in order for the method to return true.

Specified by:
hasIdtAdminAccess in interface GeneralDao
Parameters:
value - The value to search
Returns:
true when value equals "Display_IDT". Otherwise, false is returned.
Throws:
DatabaseException - Genrael database access errors.
